attributes.action: Develop a register of domestic abuse perpetrators
attributes.additional_details:
Violence against women must be better addressed and this would offer further protection to women from harm.

This could form part of the new Domestic Abuse Bill currently going through parliament.
attributes.background: This would be similar to the sexual offenders register and would give an opportunity the ability to understand the extent of the problem of violence against women and give women more power.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign this petition which we currently have open on the topic:

Create a public register of domestic violence/abuse offenders
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571420
